about_the_game:
Florafriend is a thoughtfully designed 2.5D puzzle platformer that invites you into a vibrant and mysterious world, where light becomes your ally in an extraordinary journey. Traverse lush, hand-crafted environments brimming with life as you guide plants and creatures through intricate puzzles. Play as a robot on a heartfelt mission to save Sara, a young girl whose life depends on a rare, mythical plant.

Game Features

  • Master the Light: Harness the power of light to manipulate the world around you. Grow platforms, awaken dormant flora, and reveal hidden paths to solve challenging puzzles.

  • Embark on an Unforgettable Quest: Venture across a series of stunning landscapes, from tranquil forests to crumbling ruins, each teeming with secrets to discover.

  • Engage in Mind-Bending Puzzles: Confront puzzles that test your wit and creativity, blending environmental manipulation with innovative mechanics.

  • A Story of Hope and Connection: Unfold a touching narrative as the robot and Sara’s fates intertwine, exploring themes of perseverance, care, and the bond between humans and machines.

  • Beautiful, Immersive Art: Every scene is lovingly crafted, blending vibrant colors with atmospheric depth to create an enchanting world that feels alive.

  • Captivating Soundtrack: Immerse yourself in a rich, evocative score that reflects the journey's emotional highs and lows.

A World Full of Wonder

The world of Florafriend is alive with detail and personality. From towering plants that sway in the light to creatures that react to your every move, every corner hides a story waiting to be uncovered.

If you love inventive puzzles, heartwarming stories, and exploring mesmerizing worlds, Florafriend offers a one-of-a-kind adventure that will linger in your heart long after the final bloom.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 460 / AMD Radeon HD 6850 or equivalent (2GB VRAM)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX-compatible
  • Additional Notes: Optimized for 1080p resolution; lower-end systems may need reduced graphical settings
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 or AMD Ryzen 5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 / AMD Radeon RX 580 or equivalent (4GB VRAM)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX-compatible
  • Additional Notes: Supports resolutions up to 4K for enhanced visuals; controller support included
